meanings.definition: Not staying the same; changing or moving
meanings.sent1: The weather in our city is nonstatic, always changing from sunny to rainy.
meanings.sent2: Her mood was nonstatic, shifting from happy to sad throughout the day.
meanings.sent3: The nonstatic traffic lights seemed to be playing a game of red light, green light.
meanings.sent4: The nonstatic river flowed swiftly, never lingering in one spot for long.
meanings.sent5: The nonstatic clouds painted a beautiful picture in the sky, constantly morphing into new shapes.

meanings.sent1: The nonstatic market was always bustling with activity and new products.
meanings.sent2: His nonstatic career took him to different countries and industries.
meanings.sent3: The nonstatic playground equipment kept the children entertained for hours.
meanings.sent4: Her nonstatic ideas sparked creativity and innovation in the team.
meanings.sent5: The nonstatic dance performance captivated the audience with its energy and movement.

meanings.definition: Not static; in motion or progress
meanings.sent1: The nonstatic train journey provided ever-changing views of the countryside.
meanings.sent2: Their relationship was nonstatic, evolving and growing stronger over time.
meanings.sent3: The nonstatic clock seemed to be racing ahead, never slowing down.
meanings.sent4: His nonstatic mind was always seeking new challenges and experiences.
meanings.sent5: The nonstatic project kept the team on their toes, adapting to new requirements constantly.
